songs.title: Stay With Me Forever
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I said girl
What you wanna do to me
I can be your fantasy
Tonight

I said girl
What you, what you wanna do?
It can just be me and you
Tonight tonight

[Pre-Hook]
People say it can't be found
Love is in the air right now
And you can tell I really care right now
When I touch you like that babe

[Hook]
Stay with me forever
Lay with me forever
As long as we're together
We'll be fine, we'll be fine

Stay with me forever
Lay with me forever
As long as we're together
We'll be fine, we'll be fine

We'll be fine
Girl you know that we'll be fine
You can never leave my mind
Girl you know that we'll be fine
We're alright

[Verse 2]
I said girl
We can take it to the floor
I'm gonna have you screaming more
Tonight

I said girl
We can lay and watch a movie
Or we can jump in the jacuzzi
Tonight

[Pre-Hook]
People say it can't be found
Love is in the air right now
And you can tell I really care right now
When I touch you like that babe

[Hook]
Stay with me forever
Lay with me forever
As long as we're together
We'll be fine, we'll be fine

Stay with me forever
Lay with me forever
As long as we're together
We'll be fine, we'll be fine

[Verse 3]
I ain't looking for a heartbreak
Now that's a feeling that I can't shake
No time for the heartache
Too busy making love on the mattress
(missing line)
It's time for the mistakes
(missing line)
I just wanna say babe

[Hook]
Stay with me forever
Lay with me forever
As long as we're together
We'll be fine, we'll be fine

Stay with me forever
Lay with me forever
As long as we're together
We'll be fine, we'll be fine

We'll be fine
Girl you know that we'll be fine
You can never leave my mind
Girl you know that we'll be fine
We're alright
